page.title: 13The Elderly in Appleby
page.content: In Appleby there are four places where elderly people can be cared for. There is Edenside where there are helpers who make the old people's meals.Edenside is a very big place and it is by the river Eden. St Annes has a little yard with eleven houses around it,the proper name for these houses is Almshouses.They have their own little chapel too in the yard.The Almshouses are up Boroughgate near the Castle. Rampkin House is up Scattergate it has some flats which elderly people live in with a warden in charge to look after them.Rampkin house is down Scattergate Close near a farmers field.I used to have a great aunty who lived in Rampkin House. There is also another house in Scattergate where four old ladies live on their own. Caroline Jacks
